text: Iseline Crivelli (born 6 April 1903, date of death unknown) was an Italian alpine skier. She competed in the women's combined event at the 1936 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1903 births Category:Year of death missing Category:Italian female alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Italy Category:Alpine skiers at the 1936 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Milan
title: Iseline Crivelli
